attributes.action: reinstate the death penalty to reduce overcrowding in prisons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As so many innocent people are being murdered in the UK and with the advances in DNA testing with definate results, we the undersigned want the Death Penalty reinstated in the UK. As a result of this prisons would not have the continued issue of overcrowding, and the UK would be a safer place to live.

rejection.details:
There are already petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=death+penalty
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
